about_the_game:
KILLING IS EASY

500 Caliber Contractz is a momentum-based 3D-Platformer in which you play as a contract killer hired via crowdfunding to murder CEOs, Disgraced Sinister Ex-Doctors, Private-Prison-Owning DJs, etc. With your handy high caliber sniper rifle and a chest full of anxiety, you can and will propel yourself to where you need to be. Collect tokens that float around for a reason I haven't bothered coming up with and then murder your target. Do it. Please.

MORE DETAILZ

In this game you are given a large variety of moves and plopped into an open level to explore as you please. Each level contains multiple contracts that each have their own unique target as well as a few extra tasks to complete. There is also a bunch of things to collect including Assassin Tokens, Money$$$, and a bunch of outfits for the main character, including some cameos from games made by my friends :O

FEATUREZ

  • About 3 Levels
  • Multiple Contractz Per Level
  • A bunch of cool outfits
  • Lil cigarette guys you can shoot
  • Maybe some secrets idk

CREDITZ:

Created By: Bryce Bucher

Music: Modus Interactive, Shinigami, JAM2GO
Additional Programming: Feverdream Johnny
Additional Assets: Modus Interactive
Promotional Very Cool Key Art Illustration: турбожаба

content_descriptors.notes: Excessive Cartoon Gore and Curse Words

name: 500 CALIBER CONTRACTZ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or so
  • Processor: Something decent probably
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hopefully good
  • Sound Card: Something that will make noises for you
  • Additional Notes: You'll probably be fine
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: IRL
  • Processor: Dyson Sphere
  • Memory: 999999 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Brain Interface One Billion
  • Sound Card: Gigantic Speaker From Movie
  • Additional Notes: Gamer Epic

Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: A 3D-Platformer where you kill rich people with a big sniper rifle.
